allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: 添加ccteam插件设计文档

- 定义15个智能体角色（产品、设计、开发、测试、运维）
- 设计瀑布式10阶段开发流程
- 规划193个skills（含45个整合现有skills）
- 配置14个MCP工具
- 支持Web、移动端、小程序多端开发

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: 实现ccteam插件完整功能

- 创建15个专业角色智能体定义\(agents/\)
- 实现6个入口技能和15个角色快捷技能\(skills/\)
- 定义10阶段开发工作流\(workflows/\)
- 创建13个文档模板\(templates/\)
- 配置14个MCP工具集成\(mcp.json\)
- 添加插件配置和全局设置

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(schema\): add project status JSON Schema definition

Add comprehensive JSON Schema \(draft-07\) for project status management:
- projectInfo: project metadata and tech stack
- currentStage: active stage tracking
- stages: 10-stage workflow with review and parallel execution support
- team: agent roles, status, and permissions
- issues: issue tracking with priority and resolution
- metrics: project progress indicators

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
